dmca.title: flippyodegard.com complains of infringement by blog re-publishing
dmca.body:
1.	"The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.lyricainformation.com/lyrica32.html"

2.	Most of the content on that page has been scraped from my blog
www.flippyodegard.com - you'll find that most of the long entries on that page will have my blog hyperlinked. They did not receive permission to use my content, nor did they respond when I sent an email asking them to remove said content.


4. Provide information, if possible, sufficient to permit Google to notify the owner/administrator of the web page that allegedly contains infringing material (email address is preferred).

The email address for the owner of the site is [private]@domainsbyproxy.com


"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."

"I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed
[private] aka www.flippyodegard.com
